sentences.en: Be suited to the wrappage which is ponderous, so need not forklift.
sentences.cn: 适合笨重移动不易之包装物, 不必使用堆高机.

sentences.en: Brookhart was a large, well - fed , ponderous and cautious corporation lawyer.
sentences.cn: 布洛克哈特是一位个子高大, 营养充足, 持重谨慎的公司法律顾问.

sentences.en: Earlier prose , is neither ponderous, flowery nor oratorical.
sentences.cn: 早期的教文,即不呆板, 也不华丽,也不做作.

sentences.en: Finally down from its shelf he dragged the ponderous Roman.
sentences.cn: 终于他从架上拽下那沉闷的罗马人.

sentences.en: He had a dense, ponderous style.
He spoke in a slow, ponderous way.
He was not ponderous, as I am.
His steps were heavy and ponderous.
If the bulk of New England writing was ponderous, at least it was rarely trivial.
sentences.cn: 假使大部分新英格兰作品沉闷乏味,那么, 至少烦琐浅薄得还不够.

sentences.en: It was easy to underestimate him because of his occasionally ponderous manner.
sentences.cn: 由于他偶尔现出的沉闷的姿态,很容易使人小看了他.

sentences.en: Its war - machine is ponderous and slow - moving, with limited efficiency.
sentences.cn: 他们的战争机构很笨重,行动很慢, 效力有限.

sentences.en: Public art, such as sculptures and murals, will become ponderous and ugly.
sentences.cn: 公共艺术, 如雕塑和壁画, 将成为笨重和丑陋的.

sentences.en: She watched the cow's ponderous progress.
sentences.cn: 她看着牛迟缓地向前走着。

sentences.en: The elephant lowered its ponderous body into the water.
sentences.cn: 大象把它那笨重的身躯浸入水里.

sentences.en: The naughtiness in Tun - weng's smile and tone was ponderous enough to have caved in the floor.
sentences.cn: 遯 翁笑容和语气里的顽皮,笨重得可以压坍楼板.
那方法虽然呆板，可是管用。

words.tran_cn: 有重量的；可称量的；有价值的

trans.tran_cn: 沉重的，笨重的，呆板的，沉闷的
trans.tran_en: Ponderous writing or speech is very serious, uses more words than necessary, and is dull
